scripts.migrate: npx prisma migrate dev --name init --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --schema=./prisma/schema.test.prisma
scripts.generate: npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.test.prisma
scripts.updateDatabase: npm run migrate && npm run generate
